title: Beer
content: Beer binds people together and serves to reinforce social hospitality and communality during ceremonial and everyday activities. The processing and consumption of beer pervades many cultural acts, and because of its social, economic and political value it is of great significance, both as a dietary staple and as a luxury food.
quote: "Because no great story ever started with someone eating a salad"

title: Skateboard
content: Skateboarding damages urban terrain features such as curbs, benches, and ledges when skateboarders perform "grinds" and other tricks on these surfaces. Private industry has responded to this problem by using skate deterrent devices, such as the Skatestopper, in efforts to prevent further damage and to reduce skateboarding on these surfaces.
quote: "Skateboarding doesn't owe you sh**. It owes you wheel-bite in the rain. You owe skateboarding!"
